Structure of human apurinic / apyrimidinic endonuclease 1 with the essential Mg 2 + cofactor .( Received 20 July 2013 ; accepted 1 October 2013 ; online 19 November 2013 ) .Apurinic / apyrimidinic endonuclease 1 ( APE1 ) mediates the repair of abasic sites and other DNA lesions and is essential for base - excision repair and strand - break repair pathways .
